content:
I am proposing the enclosed and linked block vote next Monday. As usual, let the chairs and myself know (or post here) if you want any issue to be separately considered. The proposed changes are available for inspection in the current build: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-shorthand/
FSH-Block-Vote-1.xlsx
Mark, I would like to pull FHIR-33572 and FHIR-33560.
